aboutIntro: This project was created with the aim of making reading accessible to everyone, especially for those who do not have the resources to buy books. Here, you can search a vast collection of available books.
searchDescription: If you are looking for a specific book, just type the title in Portuguese or English in the search field and click 'Search'. The system will search for corresponding books and display links for you to read them online.
greeting: Thank you for visiting Online Reading!
